Method parameters in spie with type arguments of type Exon
private static Read Statistics.getShortReadIfCompatible(net.sf.samtools.SAMRecord samRecord, ArrayList<Interval> samInterval, Collection<Exon> exonList)
          Gets a new ShortRead if the SAMRecord is compatible 1) First find the exon where the short read begins 2) Catch the case of a single interval --See if the short read is completely within the exon 3) If more than one interval, check each interval with the next ones.
